channel.title: My big questions thread
channel.description:
Ok, i own a server (TrixterScape) That i recently put back into BETA state to re-make. I have some questions that i've asked over time:
About shopkeepers: If i change the location of a shopkeeper, that shopkeeper will not sell stuff anymore and is he has a "trade" option, it'll d/c me when i click it.
My npcdrops.cfg isn't working. When i assign something to an noc, they don't drop it. Ex: CODE: npcdrop = 795 1 995 1000 274 1 AUTOSPAWN CODE: spawn = 795 3238 3434 0 3238 3434 3238 3434 2 Ice Queen All she drops is a consecration seed, which is what everything drops.
How do I make mod/admin-only spells/items?
can I add a command to Client.java or to my commands.java document?
How do I make it so NPC drops are random?
I have a problem when I compile: Cannot reach break Break ^
It still runs without error, though. That's it, for now..

item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Have you added the shops in client.java?

Read full topic

Ok, i own a server (TrixterScape) That i recently put back into BETA state to re-make. I have some questions that i’ve asked over time:

About shopkeepers:
If i change the location of a shopkeeper, that shopkeeper will not sell stuff anymore and is he has a “trade” option, it’ll d/c me when i click it.

My npcdrops.cfg isn’t working. When i assign something to an noc, they don’t drop it. Ex:
CODE: npcdrop = 795 1 995 1000 274 1
AUTOSPAWN CODE: spawn = 795 3238 3434 0 3238 3434 3238 3434 2 Ice Queen
All she drops is a consecration seed, which is what everything drops.

How do I make mod/admin-only spells/items?

can I add a command to Client.java or to my commands.java document?

How do I make it so NPC drops are random?

I have a problem when I compile:

It still runs without error, though.
